thread.title: Of all Jeremy Corbyn's ideas, a Robin Hood tax may be the worst
thread.title_full: Of all Jeremy Corbyn's ideas, a Robin Hood tax may be the worst

author: Ben Wright
title: Of all Jeremy Corbyn's ideas, a Robin Hood tax may be the worst
text: Why BT is likely to be hanging on to Openreach Of all Jeremy Corbyn's ideas, a Robin Hood tax may be the worst The new Labour leader is keen to sign the UK up to a new EU tax that European politicians are trying to kill before it even gets off the ground By Ben Wright , Group Business Editor 9:43AM BST 21 Sep 2015
